IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WOODBERRY FOREST IS A HIGHLY SELECTIVE BOYS' SECONDARY BOARDING SCHOOL EMPHASIZING INTELLECTUAL THOROUGHNESS, MORAL INTEGRITY, AND GOOD SPORTMANSHIP.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO DEVELOP IN OUR STUDENTS, UNDER CHRISTIAN PRINCIPLES, A HIGH SENSE OF HONOR AND MORAL INTEGRITY, A DEEP RESPECT FOR SOUND SCHOLARSHIP, A FULL ACCEPTANCE OF RESPONSIBILITY, A LOVE OF EXCELLENCE, AND A DESIRE TO BE OF SERVICE TO OTHERS. WE AIM TO HELP OUR STUDENTS BECOME LEADERS OF AND ACTIVE CONTRIBUTORS TO SOCIETY. WE INTEND TO PREPARE THEM TO ENTER THE BEST COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES CONSISTENT WITH THEIR POTENTIAL.
IRS990.Desc: INSTRUCTION: THE SCHOOL PROVIDED INSTRUCTION TO APPROXIMATELY 400 STUDENTS IN GRADES NINE THROUGH TWELVE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ATHLETICS AND STUDENT SERVICES: THE SCHOOL PROVIDED ATHLETICS AND OTHER PROGRAMS AND SERVICES TO THE ENROLLED STUDENTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SUMMER PROGRAMS: THE SCHOOL PROVIDED SUMMER STUDY PROGRAMS, OVERSEAS PROGRAMS AND SPORTS CAMPS.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: ASSISTANT HEADMASTER AND DEAN OF STUDENTS
ASSOCIATE ATHLETIC DIRECTOR AND HEAD FOOTBALL COAC

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT FUND SUPPORTS SCHOLARSHIPS FOR STUDENTS, FACULTY SUPPORT, AWARDS FOR FACULTY AND STUDENTS, AND VARIOUS OTHER ACADEMIC AND OPERATIONAL USES.

WOODBERRY FOREST SCHOOL IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. HOWEVER, INCOME FROM CERTAIN ACTIVITIES NOT DIRECTLY RELATED TO THE SCHOOL'S TAX-EXEMPT PURPOSE IS SUBJECT TO TAXATION AS UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. IN ADDITION, THE SCHOOL QUALIFIES FOR THE CHARITABLE CONTRIBUTION DEDUCTION UNDER SECTION 170(B)(1)(A) AND HAS BEEN CLASSIFIED AS AN ORGANIZATION THAT IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION UNDER SECTION 509(A)(2).
STUDENT STORE COST OF GOODS SOLD 410,559.
STUDENT STORE COST OF GOODS SOLD 410,559.

A STATEMENT OF THE NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY OF WOODBERRY FOREST SCHOOL IS PRINTED ON ALL CATALOGS, APPLICATIONS, NOTIFICATIONS, AND OTHER SIGNIFICANT PUBLICATIONS OF THE SCHOOL. WOODBERRY FOREST SCHOOL USES PRINTED ADVERTISING MATERIAL IN RECRUITING STUDENTS THROUGHOUT THE UNITED STATES AND ITS TERRITORIES. IN ORDER TO ASSIST IN RECRUITING A STUDENT BODY REFLECTING A BROAD SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC MIX, ALL SUCH MATERIALS CONTAIN A CLEAR AND UNEQUIVOCAL STATEMENT OF THE SCHOOL'S NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICIES AS APPLIED TO SCHOOL LIFE. A SPECIAL EMPHASIS IS MADE OF THESE POLICIES IN THE AREAS OF ADMISSIONS AND FINANCIAL AID.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WOODBERRY FOREST SCHOOL KEEPS ITS BOOKS ON THE ACCRUAL BASIS OF ACCOUNTING. THE INFORMATION REPORTED ON SCHEDULE F IS ALSO REPORTED ON THE ACCRUAL BASIS OF ACCOUNTING.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: THE SCHOOL AWARDS SCHOLARSHIPS IN THE FORM OF TUITION REDUCTIONS. NO FUNDS ARE PAID TO INDIVIDUALS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL'S FINANCIAL AID OFFICE MAINTAINS RECORDS SUPPORTING THE SELECTION CRITERIA USED TO AWARD SCHOLARSHIPS, THE AMOUNTS AWARDED, AND THE RECIPIENTS.

CERTAIN EMPLOYEES' EMPLOYMENT CONTRACTS REQUIRE THEM TO RESIDE ON THE GROUNDS OF THE SCHOOL FOR THE CONVENIENCE OF THE EMPLOYER IN ORDER TO CARRY OUT THEIR JOB DUTIES. THE FAIR RENTAL VALUE OF THE HOUSING BENEFIT IS INCLUDED IN NON-TAXABLE BENEFITS IN SCHEDULE J, PART III FOR THE APPLICABLE EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY MANAGEMENT AND PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT IS SIGNED ANNUALLY BY BOARD OF TRUSTEE MEMBERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES, AND POTENTIAL CONFLICTS ARE DISCLOSED ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HEADMASTER AND OFFICER COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. COMPARABLE DATA FROM INDEPENDENT SCHOOL SURVEYS ARE USED TO DETERMINE FAIR COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S 990 AND 990-T ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART XI, LINE 8, PRIOR PERIOD ADJUSTMENT:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN PRIOR YEARS, SOME OF THE PLEGES RECEIVED WITHOUT DONOR RESTRICTION WERE PLACE INTO RESTRITED ENDOWMENT FUNDS. WOODBERRY FOREST SCHOOL SUBSEQUENTLY MOVED THESE PLEDGES INTO UNRESTRICTED ENDOWMENT FUNDS, RESULTING IN A PRIOR PERIOD ADJUSTMENT TO THE CLASSIFICATION OF NET ASSETS FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2015. THERE WAS NO CHANGE IN TOTAL BEGINNING NET ASSETS AS A RESULT OF THIS CHANGE. GOLF MEMBERSHIP REVENUE WAS PREVIOUSLY BILLED AND RECORDED AS REVENUE AND A RECEIVABLE IN THE YEAR BEFORE THE GOLF MEMBERSHIP COVERAGE PERIOD. WOODBERRY FOREST SCHOOL SUBSEQUENTLY RECORDED GOLF MEMBERSHIP REVENUE IN THE YEAR OF THE MEMBERSHIP COVERAGE PERIOD, RESULTING A PRIOR PERIOD ADJUSTMENT TO NET ASSETS, AUXILIARY REVENUE, AND ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE. THE BEGINNING NET ASSETS WERE REDUCED BY $150,578 AS A RESULT OF THIS CHANGE.
